Name: DUO
About the game: DUO is an arcade game designed from the ground up for virtual reality. Now you can immerse yourself in a virtual world with a classic retro game. 'This could be Viveâ€™s best brick breaker. Give it a go.' - UploadVR Use your paddles to hit the ball and smash the bricks. Pass through the funny and challenging levels. Try not to miss the ball and remember that time is running out. Catch the green power ups! You might get more points or additional balls. Avoid the red ones! They will shrink your shields or switch off the light. You can play normal mode or if you like challenges choose the hard mode. So take the paddles to your hands and start your fun by smashing 90 levels!
